response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the steak on the frying pan. The next step is to cook the steak on the stove.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the steak out of the fridge
(3) Move to the stove
(4) Put the steak on the frying pan
(5) Cook the steak on the stove
(6) Put the cooked steak on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Cook the steak on the stove
    steak = registry(env,"steak_201")
    cook(robot, steak)
    donothing(env)
